<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The design goals of the logger are:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - no dependencies that llvm doesn&#39;t already have.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - support streaming, so that we don&#39;t need to buffer data during compilation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - 0-decoding tensor values. Tensor values are potentially very large buffers</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of scalars. Because of their potentially large size, avoiding</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// serialization/deserialization overhead is preferred.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The simple logger produces an output of the form (each line item on its line)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - header: a json object describing the data that will follow.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - context: e.g. function name, for regalloc, or &quot;default&quot; for module-wide</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// optimizations like the inliner. This is the context to which the subsequent</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// data corresponds.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - observation number.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - tensor values - raw bytes of the tensors, in the order given in the header.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The values are in succession, i.e. no separator is found between successive</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// tensor values. At the end, there is a new line character.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - &#91;score&#93; - this is optional, and is present if it was present in the header.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Currently, for final rewards, we output &quot;0&quot; scores after each observation,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// except for the last one.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &lt;repeat&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The file should be read as binary, but the reason we use newlines is mostly</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ease of debugging: the log can be opened in a text editor and, while tensor</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// values are inscrutable, at least the sequence of data can be easily observed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Of course, the buffer of tensor values could contain &#39;\\n&#39; bytes. A reader</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// should use the header information to know how much data to read for the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// tensor values, and not use line information for that.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// An example reader, used for test, is available at</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Analysis/models/log&#95;reader.py</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Example:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#123;&quot;features&quot;:&#91;list of TensorSpecs&#93;, &quot;score&quot;:&lt;a tensor spec&gt;&#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#123;&quot;context&quot;: &quot;aFunction&quot;&#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#123;&quot;observation&quot;: 0&#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &lt;bytes&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#123;&quot;outcome&quot;: 0&#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &lt;bytes for the tensor corresponding to the &quot;score&quot; spec in the header&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#123;&quot;observation&quot;: 1&#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#123;&quot;context&quot;: &quot;anotherFunction&quot;&#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#123;&quot;observation&quot;: 0&#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;ANALYSIS&#95;UTILS&#95;TRAININGLOGGER&#95;H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;ANALYSIS&#95;UTILS&#95;TRAININGLOGGER&#95;H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/stringmap-h">llvm/ADT/StringMap.h</a>&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/tensorspec-h">llvm/Analysis/TensorSpec.h</a>&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &lt;vector&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Logging utility - given an ordered specification of features, and assuming</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a scalar reward, allow logging feature values and rewards.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The assumption is that, for an event to be logged (i.e. a set of feature</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">/// values and a reward), the user calls the log&#42; API for each feature exactly</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">/// once, providing the index matching the position in the feature spec list</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">/// provided at construction. The example assumes the first feature&#39;s element</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">/// type is float, the second is int64, and the reward is float:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">/// event 0:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="comment">///   logFloatValue(0, ...)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">///   logInt64Value(1, ...)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">///   logFloatReward(...)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">/// event 1:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">///   logFloatValue(0, ...)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">///   logInt64Value(1, ...)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="comment">///   logFloatReward(...)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">/// At the end, call print to generate the log.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Alternatively, don&#39;t call logReward at the end of each event, just</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">/// log&#123;Float|Int32|Int64&#125;FinalReward at the end.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logger"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logger/#afa8b89d00af0e306a92b7e9c9d5bc681">Logger</a> final &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;raw&#95;ostream&gt; OS;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;TensorSpec&gt; FeatureSpecs;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/tensorspec">TensorSpec</a> RewardSpec;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::string CurrentContext;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> writeTensor(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/tensorspec">TensorSpec</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/spec">Spec</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;RawData) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">    OS-&gt;write(RawData, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/spec">Spec</a>.getTotalTensorBufferSize());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> logRewardImpl(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;RawData);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Construct a Logger. If IncludeReward is false, then logReward or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// logFinalReward shouldn&#39;t be called, and the reward feature won&#39;t be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// printed out.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// NOTE: the FeatureSpecs are expected to be in the same order (i.e. have</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// corresponding indices) with any MLModelRunner implementations</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// corresponding to the model being trained/logged.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/logger/#afa8b89d00af0e306a92b7e9c9d5bc681">Logger</a>(std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;raw&#95;ostream&gt; OS,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Check if there is at least an observation for &#96;currentContext()&#96;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
